answers.answer: Check out my posts - I'm a feet burner too:)  Join the forums and ask for friends and they will notice your posts more - check with your Dr. - alcoholism, vitamin deficiencies, diabetes - there is a long list this could be.  I have no answers for mine, but maybe you will for yours!Take care

question: I get the burning feet sensation all day/night -- I end up having to remove my shoes at work even though its not hot at all. When I do remove the shoes, the cold floor sensation is relatively better than burning feeling, but still uncomfortable (now, too cold). I do see correlation of this discomfort to my prev night alcohol consumption.
title: Burning feet sensation
